    • Method Detail

      • eat

        public boolean eat(Board board,
                   int index)
        Method that is part of the eating process. This piece cannot be eaten, so this method always returns false, and sets toDelete as false.
        Specified by:
        eat in class BoardPiece
        Parameters:
        board - The board as context.
        index - The step of the eating process.
        Returns:
        Always false.
